subject: Steroids
Drug Abuse and Traffic
Baseball
Human Growth Hormone
lead_paragraph: In a new book, the man who sold steroids to Roger Clemens’s former trainer and chief accuser, Brian McNamee, contradicts part of Mr. McNamee’s testimony before Congress.
snippet: In a new book, the man who sold steroids to Roger Clemens’s former trainer and chief accuser, Brian McNamee, contradicts part of Mr. McNamee’s testimony before Congress.
